input.sentences: the costume contest has begun with a scary entry .
the next person was all in white .
the next person was in a asian themed outfit .
the masks on the walls were scary .
there was a judge at the end of the event .
output.sentences: It was festival time again and a friend had dressed up in an unusual beast costume.
There were also people in animal themed outfits.
The best costume was a traditional themed costume.
There was also artwork about the festival.
At The end there was a judge who picked out the best dressed person at the festival and they won a prize.
